trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that bind to data using an ASP.NET data source control.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base para controles que se vinculam a dados usando um controle de fonte de dados do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports a controls architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET oferece suporte a uma arquitetura de controles que permite que os controles de servidor Web associar aos dados de uma maneira consistente.

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Controles de servidor Web que associar aos dados são conhecidos como controles associados a dados e as classes que facilitam que são chamados de vinculação de controles da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls that are designed to use ASP.NET data source controls derive from the BaseDataBoundControl control class, which defines the base data-bound control functionality.
trans-unit.target: Controles associados a dados que são projetados para usar controles de fonte de dados do ASP.NET derivam da classe de controle BaseDataBoundControl, que define a funcionalidade de controle de associação de dados base.

trans-unit.source: You can use the data-bound controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, to perform most Web development tasks that involve displaying data.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os controles de associação de dados que são fornecidos com o ASP.NET, incluindo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, para executar a maioria das tarefas de desenvolvimento na Web que envolvem a exibição de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In scenarios in which these controls do not provide the functionality you need, you can inherit from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classes to implement your own custom data source control.
trans-unit.target: Em cenários em que esses controles não fornecem a funcionalidade necessária, é possível herdar a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classes para implementar seus próprios dados personalizados de controle de origem.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: While any class that supports the `DataSource` and `DataSourceID` properties and the `DataBind` method is a data-bound control, most ASP.NET data-bound controls extend the abstract BaseDataBoundControl and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> classes.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto qualquer classe que oferece suporte a `DataSource` e `DataSourceID` propriedades e o `DataBind` método é um controle associado a dados, a maioria dos controles de associação de dados do ASP.NET estender o BaseDataBoundControl abstrato e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>classes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Notable exceptions include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> controls.
trans-unit.target: As exceções notáveis incluem <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre associação de dados, consulte [ASP.NET mapa de conteúdo de acesso de dados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class is abstract, you cannot create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object directly.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe é abstrata, não é possível criar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>diretamente do objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é comumente chamado pelo construtor de uma classe derivada para inicializar as propriedades definidas na <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Define o estado inicializado do controle associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: The ConfirmInitState method sets the initialized state of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: O método ConfirmInitState define o estado inicializado do controle associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>classe em seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnLoad%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Associa uma fonte de dados para o controle de servidor chamada e todos os seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class overrides the DataBind method to identify the data source that the data-bound control binds to and builds the appropriate control trees.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe substitui o método de associação de dados para identificar a fonte de dados que o controle associado a dados associa a e cria as árvores de controle apropriado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When resolving the data source, the data source identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Ao resolver a fonte de dados, a fonte de dados identificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade prevalece.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> is not set, the object identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>não for definido, o objeto identificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>propriedade é usada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `DataBind` method is sealed on all ASP.NET data-bound controls derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: O `DataBind` método está lacrado em todos os controles de associação de dados do ASP.NET derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classes should override the `PerformDataBinding` method instead of the DataBind method to bind data.
trans-unit.target: Controles associados a dados provenientes de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classes devem substituir o `PerformDataBinding` método em vez do método de associação de dados para associar dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: If DataBind is overridden, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A> events are raised out of order.
trans-unit.target: Se a associação de dados for substituída, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A>os eventos são gerados fora de ordem.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the server control binds to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que o controle de servidor vinculado a uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: This event notifies the server control that any data binding logic written for it has completed.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento notifica o controle de servidor que qualquer lógica de associação de dados criada para ela foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto do qual o controle de associação de dados recupera sua lista de itens de dados.

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você definir a propriedade de fonte de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the data-bound control has already been initialized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is called to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se o controle associado a dados já foi inicializado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>método é chamado para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [capas e temas do ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a fonte de dados do qual o controle de associação de dados recupera seus dados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ID do controle do qual o controle de associação de dados recupera sua lista de itens de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the data-bound control has already been initialized (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A> method is called or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> event is handled) when you set the DataSourceID property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is called, which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle associado a dados já foi inicializado (o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A>método é chamado ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>evento é manipulado) quando você definir a propriedade DataSourceID, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>método é chamado, o que define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [capas e temas do ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
trans-unit.target: A ID de um controle que representa a fonte de dados do qual o controle de associação de dados recupera seus dados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property is set and the data-bound control is marked to require binding.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas de <> </> *> método se a <> </> *> está definida e o controle associado a dados está marcado para exigir a associação.

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method is called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A> method, to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method if the data-bound control is not yet bound.
trans-unit.target: O método EnsureDataBound é chamado durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A>método para chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>método se o controle associado a dados ainda não estiver associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the same behavior pattern that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> (from which classes such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> are derived) and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> classes follow.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o mesmo comportamento padrão que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>(das quais classes como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>são derivados) e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>classes siga.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The `EnsureDataBound` method might also be called during calls to `CreateChildControls` and `LoadPostData` methods.
trans-unit.target: O `EnsureDataBound` método também pode ser chamado durante as chamadas `CreateChildControls` e `LoadPostData` métodos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data-bound control has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle de associação de dados foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> methods both explicitly set the Initialized property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>métodos definir explicitamente a propriedade de inicializado `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, while <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A>método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, enquanto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>é chamado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad>é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data-bound control has been initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle de associação de dados foi inicializado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>está definida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> use the IsBoundUsingDataSourceID property to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET 2.0 data source control, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Controla como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>use a propriedade IsBoundUsingDataSourceID para determinar se o controle associado a dados está associado a um controle de fonte de dados ASP.NET 2.0, como uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The value<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref> is returned if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property is set to value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""> </xref> será retornado se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>propriedade é definida para um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>; caso contrário, o valor é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether data binding is automatic.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a associação de dados é automática.

trans-unit.source: Data binding is automatic if the control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property or if the control uses `SelectMethod`, `UpdateMethod`, `DeleteMethod`, or `InsertMethod` properties for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Associação de dados é automática, se o controle usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade ou se o controle usará `SelectMethod`, `UpdateMethod`, `DeleteMethod`, ou `InsertMethod` propriedades de associação de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data binding is automatic; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a associação de dados é automática; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the control is using model binders.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o controle está usando associadores de modelo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is using model binders; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle está usando associadores de modelo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method notifies a server control that any data binding logic associated with the control has completed.
trans-unit.target: Este método notifica um controle de servidor que qualquer lógica de associação de dados associada ao controle foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method is sealed on all controls derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>método está lacrado em todos os controles derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls should override `PerformDataBinding` instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method to bind data.
trans-unit.target: Controles associados a dados devem substituir `PerformDataBinding` em vez do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>método para associar dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> is overridden, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> and OnDataBound events are raised out of order.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>for substituído, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>e OnDataBound eventos são gerados fora de ordem.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBound method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataBound também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.
trans-unit.target: Reconecta o controle de dados associados aos seus dados depois que um dos dados base da fonte de alterações de propriedades de identificação.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, or `DataMember` property value changes any time after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event has occurred.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataPropertyChanged é chamado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, ou `DataMember` o valor da propriedade alterações a qualquer momento após a página <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>evento ocorreu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to change the property value during the data-binding phase of the control.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para alterar o valor da propriedade durante a fase de associação de dados do controle.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method first calls the base class <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> method to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: O método OnInit primeiro chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>método e, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>método para tratar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the HTTP request to the page is a post back and view state is enabled, the OnInit method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se a solicitação HTTP para a página é uma postagem e estado de exibição estiver habilitado, o método OnInit define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Define o estado inicializado do controle associado a dados antes do controle for carregado.

trans-unit.source: The OnPagePreLoad event handler is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos OnPagePreLoad é usado para controlar quando a associação de dados ocorre dentro do ciclo de vida da página.

trans-unit.source: It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Ele faz isso definindo o estado interno inicializado do controle associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: Because the control's initialized state is set during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad> phase of the page's lifecycle, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering.
trans-unit.target: Como o controle do estado inicializado é definido durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad>fase do ciclo de vida da página, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>manipulador de eventos é chamado a qualquer momento em que uma propriedade de dados do controle é alterada depois dessa fase, para indicar que o controle deve associar novamente a seus dados antes da renderização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName> event handler to call <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.EnsureDataBound%2A> before calling the base class <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>substituições de classe a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>manipulador de eventos para chamar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.EnsureDataBound%2A>antes de chamar a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.EnsureDataBound%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, controls how data is retrieved and bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, controla como os dados são recuperados e associados ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Derived types override this method to retrieve data from a data source.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados substituem este método para recuperar dados de uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method should be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>método deve ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RequiresDataBinding property to `true` when the data-bound control has already begun to render its output to the page, the current HTTP request is not a callback, and you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property to identify the data source control to bind to, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method is called immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a propriedade RequiresDataBinding como `true` quando o controle associado a dados já foi iniciado processar a saída para a página, a solicitação HTTP atual não é um retorno de chamada e você estiver usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade para identificar o controle de fonte de dados para vincular a, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>método é chamado imediatamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the RequiresDataBinding property is not actually set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, a propriedade RequiresDataBinding não é realmente definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref> if the data-bound control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method should be called before the control is rendered; otherwise, the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado é<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""> </xref> se o controle de associação de dados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>método deve ser chamado antes do controle é processado; caso contrário, o valor é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle deve definir o <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""> </xref> atributo do elemento HTML renderizado para "desativado" quando o controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade indica como ASP.NET devem renderizar HTML para um controle quando o controle está desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `true`, o ASP.NET processa um `disabled` atributo quando um controle está desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `false`, o ASP.NET processa um `class` atributo quando um controle está desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade indica uma versão do ASP.NET inferior `4.0`; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, verifica se o objeto que associa um controle associado a dados a é um pode funcionar com.

trans-unit.source: The object to verify.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para verificar.

trans-unit.source: Typically an instance of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Typically an instance of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
